## MINIMUM\_NET\_DEBT variable

A Trove must always have at least this much debt on top of the [liquidation reserve](./stablecoin-lib-base.liquidation_reserve.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
MINIMUM_NET_DEBT: Decimal
```

## Remarks

Any transaction that would result in a Trove with less net debt than this will be reverted.
